sentences.english: Language is always full of eeriness and ambiguity.
sentences.chinese: 语言总是充满了吊诡和歧义。

sentences.english: Bones hung from the ceiling like a macabre chandelier.
sentences.chinese: 吊在天花板上的骨头就像是一个阴森的枝形吊灯。

sentences.english: just to keep you poised and on tenterhooks.
sentences.chinese: 这是为了吊你们的好奇心。

sentences.english: He has to draw spades first in order to make the contract.
sentences.chinese: 为了完成定约墩数，他得先吊黑桃。

sentences.english: It suspends its victims from the cave ceiling until it is ready to feast.
sentences.chinese: 它把猎物吊在洞顶上，直到要享用时才取下来。

sentences.english: You hang your wedding ring over your belly and it moves in circles
sentences.chinese: 把你的戒指吊在肚子上方，戒指绕圈圈。

sentences.english: About a minute later, the sound is picked up by a microphone suspended under the receiving ship.
sentences.chinese: 约一分钟后，吊在接收船下的传声器收听到这一声音。

sentences.english: He was dozing in the hammock when I called.
sentences.chinese: 当我造访时他正在帆布吊床上打瞌睡。

sentences.english: It is difficult to turn over in a hammock.
Four fixed rings need to be added on upper deck for derrick holds.
sentences.chinese: 吊货舱上层甲板上应装4个固定环。

sentences.english: Heavy Load "Star Request" Function Test for each deck crane.
sentences.chinese: 对于每台克令吊都要做重载问询功能试验。

sentences.english: Shed can be used throughout the climb has been hanging electric hoist to the ground and then demolished.
sentences.chinese: 整个爬棚可以用电动葫芦一直吊到地面再拆卸。

sentences.english: Lost pendant BaiXi bad words after the start time, BaiXi suspicious huimei.

sentences.english: Heavy Lift Mast Crane, Floating Sheerleg, Offshore Crane.

sentences.english: They stayed in their hammocks until the congregation had dispersed.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直在吊床上待着，等教堂里的会众解散。
